pullRequest.title: added data backed integration tests for GetCommittees.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixed committees retrieval when block is missing from a slot.
Partially addresses #1473
Signed-off-by: Paul Harris paul.harris@consensys.net

commit.message:
added data back integration tests for GetCommittees.

Fixed committees retrieval when block is missing from a slot.

Partially addresses #1473

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

nodes.bodyText: would it be clearer if instead of sixteen we had requestedEpoch * slots_per_epoch
actually isn't the "when block is missing" bit irrelevant - block will always be missing for future epoch, right?

commit.message:
changes from review feedback.

Moved hissing state test into the data backed tests.
